description:
Provides a Pinpoint ADM (Amazon Device Messaging) Channel resource.

~> **Note:** All arguments including the Client ID and Client Secret will be stored in the raw state as plain-text.
[Read more about sensitive data in state](/docs/state/sensitive-data.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ClientId.description: Client ID (part of OAuth Credentials) obtained via Amazon Developer Account.

ClientSecret.description: Client Secret (part of OAuth Credentials) obtained via Amazon Developer Account.

Enabled.description: Specifies whether to enable the channel. Defaults to `true`.
